name: The Miracle Mineral
description:
Prospect Games has unearthed a new volume to add to your collection! Discovered deep within an old Indiana coal mine, abandoned since the turn of the century, this relic is sure to delight with its antique graphics and stony charm. The Miracle Mineral depicts the story of an old, grizzled miner just trying to get by and care for his sickly daughter. Can you cure your ailing daughter? And can you unearth the secrets of the mountain before you're trapped forever its stony embrace?

Left click the cassette tapes to listen to them

CREDITS

  • Joshua (Audio, Voice Acting, Programming)
  • Benjamin (Graphics, Programming)
  • uelen (Graphics, Audio, Programming)
  • Charles (Programming)
  • Demetri (Voice Acting, Programming)
  • Liam (Audio, Music (that we unfortunately didn’t have time to add))
  • Levi (Graphics)
  • Rory (Voice Acting, Writing)
  • Aiden Czuba (Voice Acting “Rick”)
